This app is completely free, however the search feature does cost money to operate. If you like the app and wish to support it, please consider donating below.

All artwork displayed in this app is created by Randall Munroe of xkcd.com fame. He graciously allows the reproduction of his work for non-commercial purposes as outlined here.\nIf you would like to support his work, consider purchasing one of his awesome books. They go great on a coffee table!
